function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Inadequate sanitation and hygiene leading to the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","Overcrowding and insufficient space leading to the potential for rapid disease transmission within buildings.","Building-related health issues due to the spread of contagious diseases.","Lack of consideration for the impact of building design on contagious disease propagation.","Potential spread of contagious diseases in built environment.","Inadequate ventilation and air changes in 'surge' wards and intensive care units (ICU)","Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in a hospital surge ward and ICU","Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in the air of a ward managing patients with COVID-19."]}
